entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
